Pre-Game Insights: Imad Wasim and Mohammed Amir, who had earlier announced their retirements, are back on the national team for the Pakistan vs. New Zealand T20I series.
Michael Bracewell will lead the New Zealand team.
Several frontline players will likely be missing, including Daryl Mitchell, Mitchell Santner, and Lockie Ferguson, who are plying their trade in the Indian Premier League.
Miscellaneous Highlights: In T20 cricket, Pakistan boasts a stronger head-to-head record against New Zealand, clinching victory in 21 out of the 39 matches played between the two teams.
Others: The 1st T20I of the series will be played on Thursday, April 18, 2024, at the Rawalpindi Cricket Stadium in Rawalpindi.
The match will be streamed live in India on the FanCode app and website.
